project.name: Dr. Phil Mobile Chiropractic Website Rebuild

requirements.title: Image Assets Extraction & Organization
requirements.description: Extract, rename, and organize all images from scraped content into proper project structure

acceptanceCriteria.description: All 6+ hash-named images from scraped/images/full/ are identified
Images are renamed to original filenames (logo_simple.png, logo_white.png, service map, doctor photos, background images)
All images are placed in src/assets/images/ directory with proper naming convention
Favicon created from logo_simple.png and added to public/ directory
All images have descriptive alt text defined

tests.description: Verify all images load correctly in browser
Check favicon appears in browser tab
Verify all image files exist in expected paths

requirements.title: Branding & Color Theme Implementation
requirements.description: Update color scheme, typography, and branding to match original Dr. Phil website

acceptanceCriteria.description: Primary color updated to #6c9932 (green) in Tailwind config
Secondary color updated to #10315a (navy) in Tailwind config
Poppins font loaded and applied to headings
Lato font loaded and applied to body text
Rubik font loaded and applied to top bar and footer
Logo displays correctly in header and footer

tests.description: Verify primary green color appears on CTA buttons
Verify navy color appears in footer and accents
Check font families in computed styles

requirements.title: Hero Section Component
requirements.description: Build homepage hero with exact heading, subheading, and CTA from original site

acceptanceCriteria.description: Main heading displays: 'Adaptive Mobile Chiropractic'
Subheading displays verbatim: 'I come to your home or office so you can get better faster without the hassle'
CTA button labeled 'Schedule Now' links to http://drphilmobilechiro.janeapp.com/
Background image from original site is applied
Hero is fully responsive on mobile, tablet, and desktop
Text is readable over background (proper contrast/overlay)

tests.description: Click 'Schedule Now' button and verify JaneApp URL opens
Verify hero displays correctly at 375px, 768px, 1920px widths
Verify heading hierarchy (h1 for main heading)

requirements.title: Features Section (3 Feature Boxes)
requirements.description: Create three feature boxes with verbatim content from original site

acceptanceCriteria.description: Feature 1: Convenience & Longer Appointment Times with Clock icon and verbatim text
Feature 2: Personalized & Gentle Treatment with Fingerprint icon and verbatim text
Feature 3: Exercise Prescription with Running icon and verbatim text
Features display in responsive grid (1 col mobile, 3 cols desktop)
Icons use lucide-react and match original styling

tests.description: Verify all three feature boxes display with correct icons
Check responsive layout on mobile and desktop
Verify exact text matches original site content

requirements.title: Service Area Map Component
requirements.description: Display service area map image with list of 11 cities served

acceptanceCriteria.description: Heading displays: 'Service Area'
Service area map image (Screen-Shot-2020-02-05-at-4.16.45-PM.png) displays
All 11 cities listed: Alpine, American Fork, Cedar Hills, Highland, Lehi, Orem, Provo, Pleasant Grove, Lindon, Saratoga Springs, Eagle Mountain
Google Maps link included and functional
Component is responsive on all devices

tests.description: Click Google Maps link and verify it opens correct location
Verify map image is clear and properly sized
Count and verify all 11 cities are listed

requirements.title: Doctor Profile Component
requirements.description: Meet the Doctor section with bio and professional photo

acceptanceCriteria.description: Heading displays: 'Meet the Doctor'
Doctor name displays: 'Dr. Phil Wilkins DC ATC CNIM'
Full biography from original site displays verbatim
Professional doctor photo displays beside bio
Layout is responsive (stacked on mobile, side-by-side on desktop)

tests.description: Verify doctor photo displays with good quality
Verify bio text matches original content exactly
Test layout on mobile (320px) and desktop (1920px)

requirements.title: What to Expect Component
requirements.description: Three-step checklist explaining the treatment process

acceptanceCriteria.description: Heading displays: 'What to Expect'
Three checklist items display with check icons
All text is verbatim from original site
Step 1 mentions 45-60 minute initial visit
Step 2 mentions 30-minute follow-up appointments
Step 3 mentions Dr. Phil is 100% mobile

tests.description: Verify check icons appear beside each item
Verify all three steps display complete text

requirements.title: Testimonials Carousel
requirements.description: Carousel component displaying 4 patient testimonials with Embla

acceptanceCriteria.description: Heading displays: 'What People Are Saying About Dr. Phil'
All 4 testimonials display with verbatim text and author names (Melissa M., Ashlee E., Kolt E., Crystal P.)
Carousel uses Embla Carousel (shadcn/ui implementation)
Navigation arrows (prev/next) are functional
Carousel displays 1 slide on mobile, 2-3 on desktop
Carousel has navigation dots/indicators
Auto-play functionality works (optional feature)

tests.description: Click next arrow and verify carousel advances
Click previous arrow and verify carousel goes back
Verify all 4 testimonials are accessible via carousel
Test carousel displays 1 item at 375px width
Test carousel displays 2-3 items at 1920px width

requirements.title: Pricing Component
requirements.description: Three-tier pricing cards plus discount section with icons

acceptanceCriteria.description: Heading displays: 'Pricing'
Three pricing tiers display: Getting Started ($125), Follow Up Treatment ($75), Adjustment Only ($50)
Each tier includes verbatim description and duration
Discount section displays with heading 'Discount Rates Are Available For:'
Five discount categories shown with icons: Educators, Military, Law Enforcement, Firefighters, Multiple Family Members
CTA button 'Get Started' links to JaneApp URL
Pricing cards are responsive (stacked on mobile, 3 columns on desktop)

tests.description: Verify all three pricing cards display with correct amounts
Verify all five discount icons display correctly
Click 'Get Started' button and verify JaneApp URL opens
Test pricing layout on mobile and desktop

requirements.title: Footer Component with Contact Info
requirements.description: Footer with contact information, social links, and navigation (no contact form)

acceptanceCriteria.description: Phone number 801-369-3122 displays with clickable tel: link
Email doctorphilchiro@gmail.com displays with clickable mailto: link
Facebook link to https://www.facebook.com/drphilmobilechiro/ is functional
Instagram link is functional
White logo displays in footer
Navigation links to all pages work
'Schedule Now' CTA button links to JaneApp
NO contact form is present (requirement: JaneApp handles booking)

tests.description: Click phone number and verify tel: protocol works
Click email and verify mailto: opens email client
Click Facebook icon and verify correct page opens
Click Instagram icon and verify correct profile opens
Confirm no contact form exists in footer or anywhere on site

requirements.title: About Page
requirements.description: Full About page with extended biography and photo carousel

acceptanceCriteria.description: Page title is 'About'
Background image Photo-Jan-09-7-42-10-PM-scaled.jpg displays in hero
Extended doctor biography displays verbatim from content preservation section
Photo carousel displays 3 professional photos (DSC_0040, DSC_0165, DSC_0255)
Carousel uses Embla Carousel
'Free Consultation' CTA button links to JaneApp
Page is fully responsive

tests.description: Verify background image displays correctly
Navigate through all 3 photos in carousel
Verify extended bio matches verbatim content
Click 'Free Consultation' and verify JaneApp opens

requirements.title: Why House Calls Page
requirements.description: Why House Calls page with value proposition and background image

acceptanceCriteria.description: Page title is 'Why House Calls'
Background image DSC_0019-scaled.jpg displays in hero
Three paragraphs display verbatim from content preservation section
'Free Consultation' CTA button links to JaneApp
Page is fully responsive

tests.description: Verify background image displays correctly
Verify all three paragraphs display with verbatim text
Click 'Free Consultation' and verify JaneApp opens

requirements.title: Routing & Navigation
requirements.description: React Router configuration for all pages with header navigation

acceptanceCriteria.description: Route configured for / (Homepage)
Route configured for /about (About page)
Route configured for /why-house-calls (Why House Calls page)
Route configured for /404 (Not Found page)
Header navigation shows active state for current page
Mobile menu is functional and displays all navigation links
All navigation links work without page reload (SPA behavior)

tests.description: Navigate to each page and verify URL changes correctly
Test direct URL access to /about and /why-house-calls
Test 404 page for invalid routes
Verify active navigation state highlights current page
Open mobile menu and test all navigation links

requirements.title: SEO & Meta Tags
requirements.description: Comprehensive SEO optimization with meta tags, Open Graph, and page-specific metadata

acceptanceCriteria.description: Homepage title: 'Adaptive Mobile Chiropractic - Dr. Phil Wilkins DC ATC CNIM'
Homepage meta description includes key services and service area cities
About page has unique title and description
Why House Calls page has unique title and description
Open Graph tags (og:title, og:description, og:image, og:url, og:type) present on all pages
Twitter Card tags configured
Canonical URLs set for all pages
robots.txt file configured properly
Schema.org structured data for LocalBusiness and MedicalBusiness

tests.description: Verify all meta tags present in HTML head
Run Facebook Sharing Debugger to verify OG tags
Run Twitter Card Validator
Verify structured data with Google Rich Results Test

requirements.title: Accessibility Compliance
requirements.description: WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility compliance for all components

acceptanceCriteria.description: All interactive elements have ARIA labels
Keyboard navigation works for all interactive elements (tab, enter, space, arrows)
All images have descriptive alt text
Color contrast ratios meet WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text)
Focus indicators are visible on all interactive elements
Heading hierarchy is semantic and logical (h1, h2, h3)
Form inputs have associated labels
Skip navigation link present for keyboard users

tests.description: Run axe DevTools accessibility audit
Navigate entire site using only keyboard
Run WAVE accessibility checker
Check color contrast with Lighthouse audit
Test with screen reader (NVDA or JAWS)

requirements.title: Performance Optimization
requirements.description: Performance optimizations for fast loading and smooth UX

acceptanceCriteria.description: All images use lazy loading
Code splitting implemented for page routes
Lighthouse Performance score > 80
First Contentful Paint (FCP) < 2 seconds
Largest Contentful Paint (LCP) < 2.5 seconds
Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS) < 0.1
Total bundle size < 500KB (gzipped)

tests.description: Run Lighthouse performance audit
Check bundle size with npm run build
Run PageSpeed Insights
Analyze Core Web Vitals in production
Test loading on slow 3G connection

requirements.title: Cross-Browser & Cross-Device Testing
requirements.description: Comprehensive testing across browsers and devices

acceptanceCriteria.description: Site works correctly in Chrome (latest version)
Site works correctly in Firefox (latest version)
Site works correctly in Safari (latest version)
Site works correctly in Edge (latest version)
Site works on iOS Safari (iPhone)
Site works on Chrome Mobile (Android)
Responsive at 375px width (iPhone SE)
Responsive at 414px width (iPhone Plus)
Responsive at 768px width (iPad portrait)
Responsive at 1024px width (iPad landscape)
Responsive at 1366px width (laptop)
Responsive at 1920px width (desktop)

tests.description: Test all features in Chrome DevTools device emulator
Test on physical iPhone device
Test on physical Android device
Test on physical iPad device
Use BrowserStack for cross-browser testing

requirements.title: Functional Integration Testing
requirements.description: End-to-end testing of all user flows and integrations

acceptanceCriteria.description: All 'Schedule Now' buttons open JaneApp in new tab
All 'Free Consultation' buttons open JaneApp in new tab
All 'Get Started' buttons open JaneApp in new tab
Phone number links trigger phone dialer on mobile
Email link opens default email client
Social media links open correct profiles
Google Maps link opens correct location
All carousels (testimonials, photos) function smoothly
Mobile menu opens and closes correctly

tests.description: User flow: Homepage -> Click Schedule Now -> Verify JaneApp opens
User flow: About page -> Click Free Consultation -> Verify JaneApp opens
User flow: Why House Calls -> Click Free Consultation -> Verify JaneApp opens
Click phone number in footer on mobile device
Navigate through all testimonials in carousel
Navigate through all doctor photos in About page carousel

requirements.title: Theme & Layout Templates (Future)
requirements.description: Create 2-3 alternative theme/layout templates for client review

acceptanceCriteria.description: Create Theme Variant 1: Modern Minimal (clean white, lots of space)
Create Theme Variant 2: Professional Medical (blues and whites, trust-focused)
Create Theme Variant 3: Warm & Approachable (earth tones, personal touch)
Each theme has complete color palette, typography, and component styling
Theme switcher UI component for easy client preview
Layout Variant A: Traditional (top nav, linear sections)
Layout Variant B: Split Screen (asymmetric, modern)
Layout Variant C: Card-Based (modular, Pinterest-style)

tests.description: Preview each theme variant on homepage
Preview each layout variant on homepage
Client review session with screen recordings of each variant

requirements.title: Bug Fix: Remove Contact Form from Homepage
requirements.description: Remove contact form that appears at bottom of main page (booking should only be through JaneApp)

acceptanceCriteria.description: Contact form component is not rendered on homepage
No contact form exists anywhere on the site
All CTAs still properly link to JaneApp for booking

tests.description: Scroll through entire homepage and verify no contact form
Search codebase for Contact component usage on homepage

requirements.implementationNotes: Removed Contact component import and usage from src/pages/Index.tsx. Removed Contact component tests from src/test/accessibility.test.tsx. JaneApp booking links remain intact in Header, Hero, Footer, and Pricing components. All tests pass.

requirements.title: Bug Fix: Correct Footer Logo
requirements.description: Replace current footer logo with black and white logo from original scraped source

acceptanceCriteria.description: Identify black and white logo from scraped/images/full/ directory
Black and white logo is displayed in footer instead of current logo
Logo displays properly with correct contrast on footer background

tests.description: Verify footer displays black and white logo variant
Compare footer logo with original scraped site screenshot

requirements.title: Bug Fix: Header Logo Not Displaying
requirements.description: Fix broken/missing logo in header that currently shows as white box

acceptanceCriteria.description: Logo image displays correctly in header
Logo has correct file path and image loads without errors
Logo is properly sized and aligned in header
Logo is visible on both light and dark backgrounds

tests.description: Verify header logo displays correctly on homepage
Check browser console for image loading errors
Verify logo displays on all pages (home, about, why house calls)

requirements.title: Bug Fix: Discount Rates Box Styling
requirements.description: Fix grey background on discount rates box that makes content hard to read - should match pricing box styles

acceptanceCriteria.description: Discount rates box has same background styling as pricing cards
Text in discount section is clearly readable with proper contrast
Visual consistency between pricing cards and discount section
Meets WCAG AA color contrast requirements (4.5:1 for text)

tests.description: Verify discount section matches pricing card styling
Check color contrast ratio with accessibility tools

requirements.title: Bug Fix: Theme Selector Functionality
requirements.description: Fix theme selector/color button that currently doesn't affect page appearance

acceptanceCriteria.description: Theme selector button properly switches between theme variants
Page colors and styling update when theme is changed
Theme preference is saved and persists across page navigation
All components properly respond to theme changes

tests.description: Click theme selector and verify page appearance changes
Navigate to different page and verify theme persists
Refresh page and verify theme selection is maintained

requirements.title: Bug Fix: About Page Header and Carousel Issues
requirements.description: Fix missing header navigation on About page and broken images/links in carousel at bottom of page

acceptanceCriteria.description: Header with navigation displays on About page
Navigation links in header work on About page
All images in About page carousel load correctly without 404 errors
All links in About page carousel are functional and point to valid resources
Carousel displays properly with all 3 doctor photos

tests.description: Navigate to About page and verify header is present
Click each navigation link in About page header
Check browser console for image loading errors on About page
Navigate through carousel and verify all images display

requirements.title: Bug Fix: Replace Top Hero Image
requirements.description: Replace current top hero image with DSC_0453-scaled.jpg from original site and reposition doctor-photo-1.jpg elsewhere on page

acceptanceCriteria.description: Download and add DSC_0453-scaled.jpg from https://drphilmobilechiro.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/82/2020/01/DSC_0453-scaled.jpg
Hero section uses DSC_0453-scaled.jpg as background image
doctor-photo-1.jpg is relocated to another appropriate section on homepage
New hero image displays correctly with proper aspect ratio and positioning

tests.description: Verify DSC_0453-scaled.jpg displays as hero background
Verify doctor-photo-1.jpg appears in new location on page
Test new hero image displays well on mobile and desktop

testSuites.name: Smoke Tests
testSuites.description: Quick verification that critical functionality works

tests.description: Homepage loads without errors
All navigation links work
At least one JaneApp link works
Images load on homepage
Mobile menu opens

testSuites.name: Content Verification
testSuites.description: Verify all content matches original site verbatim

tests.description: Hero heading matches: 'Adaptive Mobile Chiropractic'
All 4 testimonials present with correct names
All 3 pricing tiers show correct amounts
Service area lists all 11 cities
Contact info correct: 801-369-3122, doctorphilchiro@gmail.com

testSuites.name: JaneApp Integration
testSuites.description: Verify all CTAs link to JaneApp correctly

tests.description: Hero 'Schedule Now' button -> JaneApp
Pricing 'Get Started' button -> JaneApp
About 'Free Consultation' button -> JaneApp
Why House Calls 'Free Consultation' button -> JaneApp
Footer 'Schedule Now' button -> JaneApp
All JaneApp links open correct URL: http://drphilmobilechiro.janeapp.com/

testSuites.name: Responsive Design
testSuites.description: Test responsive behavior at key breakpoints

tests.description: Mobile (375px): All content visible and readable
Mobile (375px): Hamburger menu works
Tablet (768px): Layout adjusts appropriately
Desktop (1920px): Full layout displays correctly
No horizontal scrolling at any breakpoint
Lighthouse Performance score > 80
First Contentful Paint < 2s
Largest Contentful Paint < 2.5s
Cumulative Layout Shift < 0.1
Total bundle size < 500KB
Lighthouse Accessibility score > 90
axe DevTools: 0 critical issues
Keyboard navigation: All interactive elements reachable
Screen reader: Site is navigable with NVDA
Color contrast: All text meets 4.5:1 ratio

P1.label: Critical
P1.description: Must be completed for initial launch

P2.label: High
P2.description: Important for quality but not blocking launch

notes.janeappIntegration: All booking handled through http://drphilmobilechiro.janeapp.com/ - NO custom contact forms
notes.contentSource: All content must match verbatim from scraped HTML files in /scraped directory
notes.imageSource: Images located in /scraped/images/full/ with hash names - need to be identified and renamed
notes.noGoogleMapsAPI: Using static map image instead of Google Maps API integration
criticalBugs: F021: Contact form still present on homepage (should be removed)
F022: Footer logo is incorrect (should use black/white version)
F023: Header logo broken/missing (shows white box)
F024: Discount rates box has poor contrast/readability
F025: Theme selector button is non-functional
F026: About page missing header navigation and has broken carousel images
F027: Hero image should use DSC_0453-scaled.jpg instead of current image
